snippet: Sunday’s game was Cris Collinsworth’s first Super Bowl at NBC, and he and his venerable partner Al Michaels lived up to the game’s hype.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column holds that NBC's Super Bowl broadcast team of Cris Collinsworth and his venerable partner Al Michaels lived up to the game’s hype.
lead_paragraph: Sunday’s game was Cris Collinsworth’s first Super Bowl at NBC, and he and his venerable partner Al Michaels lived up to the game’s hype.

headline.seo: Super Bowl: NBC’s Collinsworth Anticipated Game’s Critical Moment
headline.main: NBC’s Broadcast Team Anticipated Game’s Critical Moment
headline.print_headline: NBC’s Broadcast Team Anticipated Game’s Critical Moment
